name: Naniwa no Akindo: Futte Nanbo no Saikoro Jinsei
overview: Naniwa no Akindo - Futte Nanbo no Saikoro Jinsei is a board game up to four players can play at the same time using the multitap. There are different characters to choose as opponent and the player can choose between a male or a female character. The game features different events that appear depending on which square reachs a character. There are also some card square that the player or the opponents can use against their rivals. The main goal is to be richer character and to reach some special hotels that are around the board. When a character reachs them he wins a prize.
